comment: Twitter allows the Left to openly call for violence - but citing FBI crime statistics will get you banned. Thats okay, theres one group of people thats prepared for violence to escalate - and its not the group labeling everyone afascist.
amr:
# ::snt Twitter allows the Left to openly call for violence - but citing FBI crime statistics will get you banned. Thats okay, theres one group of people thats prepared for violence to escalate - and its not the group labeling everyone afascist.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (a / allow-01
                  :ARG0 (p / publication
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Twitter"))
                  :ARG1 (c2 / call-03
                        :ARG0 (l / left-19)
                        :ARG1 (v / violence)
                        :ARG1-of (o / open-04)))
            :ARG2 (g / get-04
                  :ARG0 (c3 / cite-01
                        :ARG0 (y / you)
                        :ARG1 (s / statistic
                              :topic (c4 / crime-02)
                              :source (g2 / government-organization
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "FBI"))))
                  :ARG1 (b / ban-01
                        :ARG2 y)))
      :snt2 (o2 / okay-04
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (g3 / group
                        :quant 1
                        :consist-of (p2 / person
                              :ARG0-of (p3 / prepare-02
                                    :ARG2 (e / escalate-01
                                          :ARG1 (v2 / violence)))))
                  :op2 (g4 / group
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG0-of (l2 / label-01
                              :ARG1 (e2 / everyone)
                              :ARG2 (p4 / political-movement
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Fascism")))))))
